snippet.title: Serpentine disk drive sound (Apple II - Broderbund)
snippet.description:
Serpentine (https://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/serpentine) was an action game published by Broderbund in 1982 for the Apple ][. The game uses quarter track protection from track C.25 to 1E.25, commonly found in Broderbund products at that time, such as Choplifter and Sea fox.

PS: The # of lives is stored at address $D8 and you can get infinite lives 

Credits:
Disk image - 4AM
